gobblin.runtime.job_catalog

Class NonObservingFSJobCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.JobCatalogBase
        • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.ImmutableFSJobCatalog
          • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.FSJobCatalog
            • gobblin.runtime.job_catalog.NonObservingFSJobCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, Instrumentable, JobCatalog, JobCatalogListenersContainer, JobCatalogWithTemplates, MutableJobCatalog

    public class NonObservingFSJobCatalog
extends FSJobCatalog
    The job Catalog for file system to persist the job configuration information. This implementation does not observe for file system changes

      • put

        public void put(JobSpec jobSpec)
        Allow user to programmatically add a new JobSpec. The method will materialized the jobSpec into real file.
        Specified by:
        put in interface MutableJobCatalog
        Overrides:
        put in class FSJobCatalog
        Parameters:
        jobSpec - The target JobSpec Object to be materialized. Noted that the URI return by getUri is a relative path.

      • remove

        public void remove(URI jobURI)
        Allow user to programmatically delete a new JobSpec. This method is designed to be reentrant.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface MutableJobCatalog
        Overrides:
        remove in class FSJobCatalog
        Parameters:
        jobURI - The relative Path that specified by user, need to make it into complete path.
